member.name: ID3D12GraphicsCommandList3.SetProtectedResourceSession
member.summary: Specifies whether or not protected resources can be accessed by subsequent commands in the command list. By default, no protected resources are enabled. After calling SetProtectedResourceSession with a valid session, protected resources of the same type can refer to that session. After calling SetProtectedResourceSession with NULL, no protected resources can be accessed.
member.param: An optional pointer to an ID3D12ProtectedResourceSession. You can obtain an ID3D12ProtectedResourceSession by calling .
member.returns: If set, indicates that protected resources can be accessed with the given session. Access to protected resources can only happen after SetProtectedResourceSession is called with a valid session. The command list state is cleared when calling this method. If you pass NULL, then no protected resources can be accessed.

member.name: ID3D12GraphicsCommandList3
member.summary: Encapsulates a list of graphics commands for rendering.
